amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. . Notwithstanding any other provision of this Act, for necessary expenses to carry out the essential air service program pursuant to 49 U.S.C. 41742(a), there is hereby appropriated $63,000,000, to be derived from the airport and airway trust fund and to remain available until expended.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to appropriate $63,000,000 to be derived from the airport and airway trust fund to carry out the essential air service program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Peterson (PA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
